Translations.Text: Alipha-la-ma-ra; egulo paripurna grantha o suspasta kora'anera ayata.
Kona samaya kapherara akanksa karabe ye, ki camatkara hata, yadi tara musalamana hata.
Apani chere dina taderake, kheye nika ebam bhoga kare nika ebam asaya byaprta thakuka. Ati satbara tara jene nebe.
Ami kona janapada dhabansa karini; kinta tara nirdista samaya likhita chila.
Kona sampradaya tara nirdista samayera agre yaya na ebam pascate thake na.
Tara balalah he ai byakti, yara prati kora'ana nayila hayeche, apani to ekajana um'mada.
Yadi apani satyabadi hana, tabe amadera kache pheresataderake anena na kena
ami pheresataderake ekamatra phayasalara jan'ye'i nayila kari. Takhana taderake abakasa deya habe na.
Ami sbayam e upadesa grantha abatarana karechi ebam ami nije'i era sanraksaka.
Ami apanara purbe purbabarti sampradayera madhye rasula prerana karechi.
Odera kache emana kona rasula asenani, yadera sathe ora thattabidrupa karate thakeni.
Emanibhabe ami e dharanera acarana papidera antare bad'dhamula kare de'i.
Ora era prati bisbasa karabe na. Purbabartidera emana riti cale asache.
Yadi ami odera samane akasera kona daraja'o khule de'i ara tate ora dinabhara arohana o karate thake.
Tabu'o ora ekatha'i balabe ye, amadera drstira bibhrata ghatano hayeche na baram amara yadugrasta haye parechi.
Niscaya ami akase rasicakra srsti karechi ebam take darsakadera jan'ye susobhita kare diyechi.
Ami akasake pratyeka bitarita sayatana theke nirapada kare diyechi.
Kintu ye curi kare sune palaya, tara pascad'dhabana kare ujjbala ulkapinda.
Ami bhu-prsthake bistrta karechi ebam tara upara parbatamala sthapana karechi ebam tate pratyeka bastu suparimitabhabe utpanna karechi.
Ami tomadera jan'ye tate jibikara upakarana srsti karachi ebam tadera jan'ye'o yadera annadata tomara na'o.
Amara kache pratyeka bastura bhandara rayeche. Ami nirdista parimane'i ta abatarana kari.
Ami brstigarbha bayu paricalana kari atahpara akasa theke pani barsana kari, erapara tomaderake ta pana kara'i. Bastutah tomadera kache era bhandara ne'i.
Ami'i jibanadana kari, mrtyudana kari ebam ami'i curanta malikanara adhikari.
Ami jene rekhechi tomadera agragamiderake ebam ami jene rekhechi pascadagamiderake.
Apanara palanakarta'i taderake ekatrita kare anabena. Niscaya tini prajnabana, jnanamaya.
Ami manabake paca kardama theke tairi bisuska thanathane mati dbara srsti karechi.
Ebam jinake era age lu era agunera dbara srjita karechi.
Ara apanara palanakarta yakhana pheresataderake balalenah ami paca kardama theke tairi bisuska thanathane mati dbara srsta ekati manaba jatira pattana karaba.
Atahpara yakhana take thikathaka kare neba ebam tate amara ruha theke phamuka deba, takhana tomara tara samane sejadaya pare yeyo.
Takhana pheresatara saba'i mile sejada karala.
Kintu ibalisa-se sejadakaridera antarbhukta hate sbikrta hala na.
Allaha balalenah he ibalisa, tomara ki halo ye tumi sejadakaridera antarbhukta hate sbikrta hale na
Balalah ami emana na'i ye, ekajana manabake sejada karaba, yake apani paca kardama theke tairi thanathane bisuska mati dbara srsti karechena.
Allaha balalenah tabe tumi ekhana theke bera haye ya'o. Tumi bitarita.
Ebam tomara prati n'yaya bicarera dina paryanta abhisampata.
Se balalah he amara palanakarta, apani amake punarut'thana dibasa paryanta abakasa dina.
Allaha balalenah tomake abakasa deya hala.
Se'i abadharita samaya upasthita ha'oyara dina paryanta.
Se balalah he amara palanakarta, apani yemana amake patha bhrasta karechena, ami'o tadera saba'ike prthibite nana saundarye akrsta karaba ebam tadera saba'ike patha bhrastha kare deba.
Apanara manonita bandadera byatita.
Allaha balalenah eta ama paryanta soja patha.
Yara amara banda, tadera upara tomara kona ksamata ne'i; kintu pathabhrantadera madhya theke yara tomara pathe cale.
Tadera sabara nirdharita sthana hacche jahannama.
Era satati daraja ache. Pratyeka darajara jan'ye eka ekati prthaka dala ache.
Niscaya khodabhirura bagana o nirjharinisahuhe thakabe.
Bala habeh egulote nirapatta o santi sahakare prabesa kara.
Tadera antare ye krodha chila, ami ta dura kare deba. Tara bha'i bha'iyera mata samana-samani asane basabe.
Sekhane tadera mote'i kasta habe na ebam tara sekhana theke bahiskrta habe na.
Apani amara bandaderake janiye dina ye, ami atyanta ksamasila dayalu.
